reviews.review_msg: Very passionate about what he teaches, approachable outside of class, caring and determined to help you learn/understand concepts

He is such a nice caring guy who really just wants you to LEARN. I totally reccomend REM 100, didnt even like this topic to start but its just AWESOME. Scott makes this awesome. Such a good knowledgeable course

Scott was a great prof. Very engaging lectures, funny, and a genuine passion for REM. Attendance was required for tutorials, and there was a group project/presentation. Exams were fair, but very little time was given.

Course: REM 100

Scott is my favorite professor. No one to date has kept me as engaged in lectures and inspired to pursue my career and academic goals as he. Funny, insightful and full of great stories from his experiences in ecology research.
